body_content.explanation: relating to a bibliography (= a list of the books, etc. that have been used when writing a particular book or article, or a list of the books from a particular writer or publisher or on a particular subject):
examples: Further bibliographical references will be given below.
He provides bibliographical notes that show his familiarity with current historical research.
Bibliographic references are cited within the text.

body_content.explanation: relating to libraries and the books and information they contain:
examples: Computerised library catalogues are just one example of the many forms of computerised bibliographical information which are available.
A team of professional librarians is headed by the bibliographical services officer.
